video_prompt: Night sky shifting colors, stars twinkling, shooting star streaking. Clouds drift and wisps move. Butterflies flutter. Saturn-like planet glows and spins its rings. Energy spiral flows, flowers sway and petals drift. Ethereal clouds envelop, water shimmers with subtle waves. A glowing red pathway pulses and swirls, reflecting on the water.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical captivating digital artwork of a magical nocturnal fantastical scene. Dark to light blue night sky with twinkling stars and a prominent white-blue shooting star. Wispy white, gray, and blue clouds, with hints of silhouetted purple trees. Pink butterflies. Central focus: large, ethereal purple and pink Saturn-like planet with luminous golden rings, enveloped in a flowing blue and white energy spiral. Vibrant clusters of red and white flowers with green foliage, and drifting pink and white petals around the planet. Dark gray and blue clouds with red undertones transition to a body of shimmering water with subtle waves. A winding, glowing red pathway resembling liquid fire pulses through the water, reflecting on the surface. Dreamlike blend of cosmic and earthly beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Sky colors shift, stars twinkle, and a shooting star streaks across. Clouds drift, their wisps moving. Butterflies flutter. A planet glows, its rings steadily spinning. Energy spirals flow, as flowers sway and petals drift. Ethereal clouds envelop. Water shimmers with subtle waves. A glowing red pathway pulses and swirls, its dynamic reflection dancing on the water.
